pages.title: Trapped Plants
pages.description: $(p) $(p)$(item)Roses$(), $(item)Dandelions$() and $(item)Dead Bushes$() can be combined with certain $(l:kettle/kettle_intro)Kettle Brews$(/l) to create trapped plants.

pages.title: Type of Traps
pages.text: Each type of plant can be combined with the following brews:$(p)$(8)> $()$(l:kettle/kettle_intro#ink)Brew of Ink$(/l)$(br)$(8)> $()$(l:kettle/kettle_intro#web)Brew of Webs$(/l)$(br)$(8)> $()$(l:kettle/kettle_intro#thorns)Brew of Thorns$(/l)$(br)$(8)> $()$(l:kettle/kettle_intro#sprouting)Brew of Sprouting$(/l)$(p)Trapped Plants will be destroyed if harvested with anything other than a $(l:artifacts/artifacts/boline)Boline$(/l).
